server.interfaces

Interface Server

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServerImpl

    public interface Server
extends java.rmi.Remote
    The methods required for the quiz server.
    Author:
    Michael Bragg

                                java.lang.NullPointerException
        Add an answer to a question (in a Quiz)
        Parameters:
        quizID - int. The ID of the Quiz (that the question is in that the answer is for)
        questionID - int. The ID of the question that the answer is for.

        java.rmi.RemoteException
